name: Claude Legal
description: An agent that uses Anthropic's legal knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5
long_description: An agent that uses Anthropic's legal knowledge work plugin and powered by Claude Sonnet 4.5. Agents: claude-legal (ChatBot). Models: gpt-5.2. Images: us-central1-docker.pkg.dev/meshagent-life/meshagent-public/cli:{SERVER_VERSION}-esgz. Skills: canned-responses, compliance, contract-review, legal-risk-assessment, meeting-briefing, nda-triage. Rules: brief.md, respond.md, review-contract.md, triage-nda.md, vendor-check.md.
